carrier.name: First Chicago Insurance Company
carrier.description: First Chicago Insurance Company is an established Midwest regional insurer that has been providing dependable service to its policyholders since 1920. Over the years, the company has gained a reputation of providing excellent service to their policyholders

products.name: Benchmark
products.description: The Benchmark personal auto product is a full featured personal auto insurance program that offers many available coverages as well as a broad set of discounts and payment options.  This product is competitively priced and provides you with the protection you need and want.
